367410.name: Fairy Fencer F: Hot Springs Set
367410.description:
Fairy Fencer F: Hot Springs Set includes Ethel's Hot Springs Set, Fang's Hot Springs Set, Galdo's Hot Springs Set, Harley's Hot Springs Set, Pippin's Hot Springs Set, Lola's Hot Springs Set, Sherman's Hot Springs Set, Tiara's Hot Springs Set, and [bp]Apollonius's Hot Springs Set[/b].

Fairy Fencer F: Ethel's Hot Springs Set
The following items will be added:
Slender Bath Towel, Slender Hand Towel
*For Ethel only

Fairy Fencer F: Fang's Hot Springs Set
The following items will be added:
Wild Bath Towel, Wild Hand Towel
*For Fang only

Fairy Fencer F: Galdo's Hot Springs Set
The following items will be added:
Toned Bath Towel, Toned Hand Towel
*For Galdo only

Fairy Fencer F: Harley's Hot Springs Set
The following items will be added:
Dynamite Bath Towel, Dynamite Hand Towel
*For Harley only

Fairy Fencer F: Pippin's Hot Springs Set
The following items will be added:
Special Apparatus Type β, Luxurious Cotton Gizmo
*For Pippin only

Fairy Fencer F: Lola's Hot Springs Set
The following items will be added:
Flat Bath Towel, Flat Hand Towel
*For Lola only

Fairy Fencer F: Sherman's Hot Springs Set
The following items will be added:
Refreshing Bath Towel, Refreshing Hand Towel
*For Sherman only

Fairy Fencer F: Tiara's Hot Springs Set
The following items will be added:
Lovely Bath Towel, Lovely Hand Towel
*For Tiara only

Fairy Fencer F: Apollonius's Hot Springs Set
The following items will be added:
Fit Bath Towel, Fit Hand Towel
*For Apollonius only
367410.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
